name: The Spacejumper Academy
description:
Hello there!

This game is/was my entry to the Blackthornprod Game Jam #2. It is a short puzzle/platformer game that is meant to be speedrunned. The reason why I upload the game early and also why the game is not too  polished is that I were not at home for the rest of the jam, otherwise the game had been more polished and bigger.

So, when it comes to credits and  that stuff, I am really  happy because I did not have  to use much code from others even though I am an amateur when it comes to game developing. I programmed like 97-98% of all code myself, all assets I made the music. Though the font I used for most of the game is not mine: it is called ZCOOLQingKeHuangYou-Regular.

The game is available for windows right now, might make mac-suff when I get back after the jam, I don't now. 

The game in its current state is a bit buggy, however it is definetely playable.

Known bugs:

-Background can't be deleted after you have played once.

-Clip through walls, boxes.

-and more

I had been really happy if you tried the game out and leaved  some criticism in the comments.

This were the first game I have ever completed and it was also my firt ever game jam.

I've learned so much of this jam!
